sources.title: Return Of The Seven (1966) 480p / Yul Brynner · Robert Fuller
sources.description: Seven gunslingers rescue the men of several villages in pre-revolutionary Mexico, kidnapped and extorted into forced labor, from the clutches of a bandit leader.   The sequel to John Sturges ' classic Western "The Magnificent Seven" (1960) is less original than its predecessor, but still exceptionally exciting.

metadata.Plot: After Calvera's defeat in The Magnificent Seven (1960), the love-smitten member of the original Seven, Chico, has started a family with his wife, Petra, in the now-liberated Mexican village. Three peaceful years later--as sixty gunmen of the tyrannical rancher, Lopez, round up the farmers to construct a church and a monument for his two dead sons--once more, it's up to Chris to assemble a septet of protectors and defend the villagers. However, can the new Magnificent Seven do the impossible and restore peace?
metadata.Actors: Yul Brynner, Robert Fuller, Julián Mateos
